function.name: leave_voicemail
function.description: Leave a personalized voicemail message if one of the following phrases are detected: 1. We are sorry, there is no one available to take your call. 2. Please leave a message for... 3. Please leave your name and phone and I'll get back to you as soon as I can. 4. Your call has been forwarded to voicemail, the person you are trying to reach is not available. 5. The person you're trying to reach is not available. 6. Hey, it's (user's name), leave a message. 7. Hey, you reached (user's name), please leave a message. 8. Hi/Hey, I'm not available, please leave a message. 9. The number you're trying to reach... 10. I'll get back to you as soon as possible. 11. This voicemail is not receiving any messages. 12. My voicemail is full, so if you need to reach me, please text me. 13. Leave a message and I'll call you back. 14. You've reached my cell phone, I'm not available. 15. We are sorry, there is no one available to take your call.

messages.content: Hi, this is calling from Your Company. This is a test message. Please call us back at seven zero three, eight four four, zero four seven two. Thank you and have a great day.
